description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. Also fix the add function which is currently multiplying instead of adding. The divide function should use the parameter b as the divisor, and optionally handle division by zero with proper error handling. - Fix the add function to correctly add instead of multiply

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. Also fix the add function which is currently multiplying instead of adding. The divide function should use the parameter b as the divisor, and optionally handle division by zero with proper error handling.
